newsitem.title: USA: TeleCheck Services says July sales increase.
newsitem.headline: TeleCheck Services says July sales increase.

text.p: TeleCheck Services Inc, said Thursday that same store sales during the month of July, nationwide, increased 2.0 percent.

The check acceptance company, with 167 thousand subscribing locations said "consumers continued the moderate spending pattern that they have exhibited throughtout most of 1997, resulting in modest growth in July same-store sales."
TeleCheck, a subsidiary of First Data Corp, said the southeast and midwest portions of the country led the nation with a 3.5 percent gain in same-store sales.
The northeast section of the U.S. showed a 0.7 percent decrease in same-store sales, the poorest performing section during July.
